name: Cogscape
description:
DISCLAIMER:
This is a fan game based off of an unreleased (as of now) action platformer made by Subvert Games. I do not deserve credit for half of the ideas in this game.

This game is still in development, therefore there are only 10 levels for now.

Welcome to Cogscape!

You play as an intelligent cog making its way through a mysterious facility. Its up to you to decide whether you should be trying to complete each level... or trying to escape.
